STEEL_CONST short mlx::steel::Conv2DWeightBlockLoader< T, BM, BN, BK, tgp_size, tgp_padding >::vec_size
Initial value:
=
(BN == 8) ? 1 : (tgp_size / (BROWS * BCOLS) >= 8 ? 8 : 4)
